para.sentence: Many special cases of q -series arise in the theory of partitions, a topic treated in §§27.14(i) and 26.9.
In Lie algebrasLepowsky and Milne (1978) and Lepowsky and Wilson (1982) laid foundations for extensive interaction with q -series.
These and other applications are described in the surveys Andrews (1974, 1986).
More recent applications are given in Gasper and Rahman (2004, Chapter 8) andFine (1988, Chapters 1 and 2).
